sen.j: 冠島（かんむりじま）は、京都府舞鶴市にある島。
sen.e: Kanmuri-jima Island belongs to Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Kanmuri-jima Island belongs to Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Kanmuri-jima Island belongs to Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 大島、雄島と呼称されることもある。
sen.e: It is also called O-o-shima, or O-shima.
sen.cmt: 大島→O-o-shima[雄島と区別するため、読み方としてこのように表記しました。]雄島→O-shima[大島と区別するため、読み方としてこのように表記しました。]
sen.e: It is also called O-o-shima, or O-shima.
It is also called Oshima(大島), or Oshima(雄島).
sen.cmt: 発音が同じなので漢字を添える形態としました。

sen.j: 舞鶴市の沖合い約10km、日本海上にある島で、1924年（大正13年）にオオミズナギドリ繁殖地として、島全体が国の天然記念物に指定されている。
sen.e: Kanumri-jima Island on the Japan Sea is located approx. 10 km off the coast of Maizuru City, and as a breeding place of Calonectris leucomelas, the whole island is designated as a nation's natural monument in 1924.

Kanumri-jima island on the Japan Sea is located approx. 10 km off the coast of Maizuru City. The entire island was designated a national natural monument in 1924 due to its being a breeding place for Calonectris leucomelas,

Kanmuri-jima Island on the Japan Sea is located approx. 10 km off the coast of Maizuru City. The entire island was designated a national natural monument in 1924 due to its being a breeding place for Calonectris leucomelas,
sen.cmt: スペルを修正しました。

sen.j: また沓島とともに京都府指定冠島沓島鳥獣保護区（集団繁殖地）に指定されている（面積は両島合わせて471ヘクタール、うち特別保護地区44ha）。
sen.e: Along with Kutsu-jima Island, the Island is designated as the Kanumrijima and Kutsujima Islands game reserve (collective breeding place) designated by Kyoto Prefecture (the total area of both islands is 471 hectares, and 44 hectares out of it is designated as special protection area).

Along with Kutsu-jima Island, the islands have been designated by Kyoto Prefacture as the Kanumrijima and Kutsujima islands game reserve (collective breeding place) (the total area of both islands is 471 hectares, with 44 hectares being set aside as a special protection area).

Along with Kutsu-jima Island, the islands have been designated by Kyoto Prefecture as the Kanmurijima and Kutsujima islands game reserve (collective breeding place) (the total area of both islands is 471 hectares, with 44 hectares being set aside as a special protection area).
sen.cmt: スペルを修正しました。

sen.j: この島は、「オオミズナギドリ最後の楽園」と言われている。
sen.e: The island is called "last paradise for Calonectris leucomelas."
The island is called "last paradise for Calonectris leucomelas."
The island is called "last paradise for Calonectris leucomelas."

sen.j: このため、基本的に島への渡航は禁止されているが、年に数回、調査のための立ち入りが許可されることがあるほか、毎年「雄島まいり」と称して、地元住民のお参りが行われている。
sen.e: Therefore, a visit to the Island is basically banned; however, a visit for survey is allowed several times a year, and local residents also visit the Island every year on the pretext of "Oshima mairi (a visit to Oshima island)."

For this reason, visits to the island are largely banned; however, survey visits are allowed several times a year, and local residents also visit the island every year on the pretext of "Oshima mairi (a visit to Oshima island)."

For this reason, visits to the island are largely banned; however, survey visits are allowed several times a year, and local residents also visit the island every year on the pretext of "Oshima mairi (a visit to Oshima island)."

sen.j: 島自体は、安山岩を主に火山性の岩石で、周囲のほとんどが切り立った崖になっており、タブノキなどの常緑広葉樹の原生林で覆われている。
sen.e: The Island in itself which consists of volcanic rocks, mainly Anzangan rock (andesite), is mostly surrounded by a vertical cliff and is covered by a virgin forest of evergreen broad-leaved trees such as Machilus thumbergii.

The island itself, which consists of volcanic rocks (mainly Anzangan rock (andesite)), is mostly surrounded by a vertical cliff and is covered by a virgin forest of evergreen broad-leaved trees such as Machilus thumbergii.

The island itself, which consists of volcanic rocks (mainly Anzangan rock (andesite)), is mostly surrounded by a vertical cliff and is covered by a virgin forest of evergreen broad-leaved trees such as Machilus thunbergii.
sen.cmt: スペルを修正しました。

sen.j: なお、舞鶴市の大浦半島や五老岳の他にも丹後半島に位置する宮津市の奈具海岸や京丹後市の経ヶ岬などからも、その島影を眺めることができる。
sen.e: The island can be seen from Oura Peninsula and Mt. Goro-gadake in Maizuru City, and also from Nagu coast in Miyazu City and Kyoga-misaki Cape in Kyotango City which are located at Tango Peninsula.
The island can be seen from Oura Peninsula and Mt. Goro-gadake in Maizuru City, and also from Nagu coast in Miyazu City and Kyoga-misaki Cape in Kyotango City which are located at Tango Peninsula.
The island can be seen from Oura Peninsula and Mt. Goro-gadake in Maizuru City, and also from Nagu coast in Miyazu City and Kyoga-misaki Cape in Kyotango City which are located at Tango Peninsula.
Total area: 126.456㎡

Total area: 126.456㎡
